title: Beef curry with pea omelette
ingredients: ['vegetable oil for frying', '4 large onions, cut into wedges or thickly sliced', '2 tablespoons Ferns Hot Curry Paste', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground coriander', '350g diced casserole beef', '1 heaped tablespoons plain flour', 'salt and pepper to taste', '475ml water', '135g basmati rice', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '4 cardamom pods', '4 beaten eggs, divided', '2 splashes milk, divided', '2 tablespoons frozen petit pois, divided', '2 spring onions, sliced lengthways, divided', '2 pinches cumin for omelette', '2 pinches coriander', '1 ripe tomato, diced', '1 large handful sliced cucumber']
